datafield.subfield: NUCMC data from Univ. of Ill. at Urbana-Champaign Archives for Argonne Universities Association. Records, 1945-1982

(Council of Participating Institutions and Associated Midwest Universities were predecessors of Argonne Universities Association; records include material from the council dated 1946-1958, from AMU dated 1958-1968, and from the association dated 1965-1982)
(on authority card for Associated Midwest Universities: the AMU, formed in May, 1958, grew from the Council of Participating Universities that was associated with Argonne National Laboratory)
